# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $15000 to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $20000. This opportunity is not to be missed, as it represents a significant value for such a high-quality item. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or making a purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
